mapper.select: SELECT TRUNC(SIGNUP_DATE) AS SIGNUP_DATE, COUNT(*) AS SIGNUP_CNT FROM USERS GROUP BY TRUNC(SIGNUP_DATE) ORDER BY TRUNC(SIGNUP_DATE)

WITH DateRange AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL AS SIGNUP_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(DR.SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SIGNUP_DATE, NVL(COUNT(U.USER_ID), 0) AS SIGNUP_CNT FROM DateRange DR LEFT JOIN USERS U ON TRUNC(U.SIGNUP_DATE) = DR.SIGNUP_DATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DR.SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(DR.SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT TRUNC(ESTABLISHMENT_DATE) AS ESTABLISHMENT_DATE, COUNT(*) AS REGISTERCOMPANY_CNT FROM COMPANYINFO GROUP BY TRUNC(ESTABLISHMENT_DATE) ORDER BY TRUNC(ESTABLISHMENT_DATE)

SELECT TRUNC(ESTABLISHMENT_DATE) AS ESTABLISHMENT_DATE, COUNT(*) AS REGISTERCOMPANY_CNT FROM COMPANYINFO WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 AND ESTABLISHMENT_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY TRUNC(ESTABLISHMENT_DATE) ORDER BY TRUNC(ESTABLISHMENT_DATE)
SELECT SKILL_CODE, COUNT(*) AS SKILL_COUNT FROM SKILL GROUP BY SKILL_CODE ORDER BY SKILL_COUNT DESC
